verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> <S%H4905>Maschil,<s%> A Psalm of <S%H1732>David,<s%> when <S%H1673>Doeg<s%> the <S%H130>Edomite<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H1732>David<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H288>Ahimelech.<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> <S%H1984>boast<s%> you yourself in <S%H7451>mischief,<s%> O <S%H1368>mighty<s%> man? the <S%H2617>goodness<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%> endures <S%H3605>continually.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>
You <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> more than <S%H2896>good;<s%> and <S%H8267>lying<s%> rather than to <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

<S%H410>God<s%> shall <S%H1571>likewise<s%> <S%H5422>destroy<s%> you for <S%H5331>ever,<s%> he shall <S%H2846>take<s%> you <S%H2846>away,<s%> and <S%H5255>pluck<s%> you out of your <S%H168>dwelling<s%> place, and <S%H8327>root<s%> you out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> also shall <S%H7200>see,<s%> and <S%H3372>fear,<s%> and shall <S%H7832>laugh<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> him:

<S%H2009>See,<s%> this is the <S%H1397>man<s%> that <S%H7760>made<s%> not <S%H430>God<s%> his <S%H4581>strength;<s%> but <S%H982>trusted<s%> in the <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of his <S%H6239>riches,<s%> and <S%H5810>strengthened<s%> himself in his <S%H1942>wickedness.<s%>

But I am like a <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H2132>olive<s%> tree in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God:<s%> I <S%H982>trust<s%> in the <S%H2617>mercy<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever.<s%>

I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> you for <S%H5769>ever,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> you have <S%H6213>done<s%> it: and I will <S%H6960>wait<s%> on your <S%H8034>name;<s%> for it is <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> your <S%H2623>saints.<s%>
